elements.title: Sunroof
elements.description: SunRoof is a Swedish startup leveraging both its own end-to-end platform and installation tech to deploy slim PV, storage and EV charging for residential. Raised 15M in [Jan 2023](https://www.eu-startups.com/2023/01/swedish-startup-sunroof-scoops-up-e13-5-million-in-new-investment-to-bring-solar-power-to-homeowners-worldwide/)

elements.title: Otovo
elements.description: Otovo AS (OTOVO) is the leading marketplace for residential solar and batteries in Europe. We are building a base of customers with recurring revenue and multi-decade relationships.

elements.title: Cambridge Power
elements.description: Cambridge Power develops, constructs and operates grid-scale energy storage and renewable generation assets throughout the UK. In Feb 2022 has signed a Framework Agreement with Brookfield Renewable to develop more than 800MW of full consented battery energy storage systems (BESS) and 185MW of co-located solar for investment over the next five years. [in the news](https://www.solarpowerportal.co.uk/news/cambridge_power_to_develop_800mw_of_uk_battery_storage_with_brookfield_rene)

elements.title: Faradion
elements.description: UK based Faradion was founded in 2011 to develop sodium-ion technology and to bring it to market. Ambani's [RIL](https://www.ril.com/) has bought it for £100M in Dec 2021, [in the news](https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/ril-buys-uk-hi-tech-battery-co-faradion-for-its-10-billion-new-energy-empire/articleshow/88615682.cms)

elements.title: Breathe
elements.description: Breathe’s Lincc software is the first to bring advanced battery management techniques to electric vehicles and consumer electronics. A spin-out of Imperial that raised £1.5 million seed round led by Speedinvest in Oct 2021

elements.title: Fuergy
elements.description: Fuergy's goal is to shift from conventional electricity consumers to innovative green power prosumers who produce, consume and share energy effectively. Based in Slovenia

elements.title: Green Frog Power
elements.description: Green Frog Power builds and operates power stations. We deliver power into the UK’s network when it is most needed. The company was bought by Investment Management Corporation of Ontario (IMCO) in October 2021 and rebranded as Pulse Clean Energy, [in the news](https://www.solarpowerportal.co.uk/news/pulse_clean_energy_targets_1gw_battery_energy_storage_portfolio)

elements.title: Storage outlook
elements.description: Global Energy Storage Market Set to Hit One Terawatt-Hour by 2030, from BNEF, also reported by [Edie](https://www.edie.net/news/8/BNEF--Global-battery-storage-capacity-to-grow-20-times-over-by-2030/). Also, from [energy storage news](https://www.energy-storage.news/cop26-the-energy-transition-is-here-to-stay-and-battery-storage-is-essential-to-it/): COP26 The energy transition is here to stay and battery storage is essential to it

elements.title: Enegen
elements.description: Enegen Power Systems (formally Dunstan Thomas Energy division) is a leading U.K. based provider of scheduling, wholesale and Balancing Mechanism dispatch and commercial optimisation software

elements.title: Clean Horizon
elements.description: French Clean Horizon is a consultancy specifically dedicated to energy storage

elements.title: Dhybrid
elements.description: Microgrid developers, Dhybrid main goal is to maximize the effectiveness of energy conversion. In [June 21](https://www.energy-storage.news/news/dhybrid-installs-microgrids-on-26-maldivian-islands-to-reduce-diesel-relian) they installed microgrids on 26 Maldivian islands to reduce diesel reliance

elements.title: Energy Storage Summit 2021 - the role of energy storage for UK net-zero
elements.description: panel discussion from the Energy Storage Summit 2021 with BEIS, Energy Systems Catapult, trade association [Energy UK](https://www.energy-uk.org.uk/) and gas network Wales & West Utilities

elements.title: Twaice
elements.description: Our predictive analytics increase the lifetime, efficiency ​and sustainability of batteries. raised 26M in May 2021, [in the news](https://techcrunch.com/2021/05/19/twaice-raised-26m-to-scale-its-battery-analytics-software/)​

elements.title: Carbon Neutral Energy
elements.description: Carbon Neutral Energy have developed a Unique Mobile Battery Storage Solution to store & deliver green electric power. CNE has embarked on [a £300m fund-raise](https://dailybusinessgroup.co.uk/2021/02/power-firm-cne-plans-300m-cash-raise-and-200-jobs/) and started expanding to the United States, two months after officially launching in the UK, [in the news May 21](https://solarbuildermag.com/news/carbon-neutral-energys-mobile-battery-storage-concept-coming-to-the-united-states/)

elements.title: DNV
elements.description: Giant group DNV are the independent expert in assurance and risk management, headquartered in Oslo with operations in more than 100 countries. They have a [part of the business](https://www.dnv.com/power-renewables/services/testing/battery-storage.html) dedicated to storage. In [December 2020](https://www.dnv.com/news/dnv-gl-performs-technical-due-diligence-for-gore-street-energy-storage-fund-s-acquisition-of-anesco-s-81-mw-uk-operational-battery-storage-portfolio-192425), selected by Gore Street Capital to undertake a range of technical due diligence services on an 81 MW operational battery storage portfolio.

elements.title: Electriq Power
elements.description: Electriq Power is a developer of intelligent and integrated home energy storage, management, and monitoring solutions, their battery systems can be found in customers’ homes and small businesses. In [April 21](https://www.energyglobal.com/energy-storage/28042021/electriq-and-cuc-to-trial-residential-battery-storage-programme/) they started to trial residential battery storage programme with Caribbean Utilities Company

elements.title: Wartsila
elements.description: Wärtsilä is a global leader in smart technologies and complete lifecycle solutions for the marine and energy markets. Deployed several storage projects [in UK for Pivot Power / EDF](https://www.energy-storage.news/blogs/how-energy-storage-helps-energy-assets-connect-with-energy-markets) and around the world

elements.title: Custom Solar
elements.description: Custom Solar designs, installs and maintains world-class solar systems for corporations and public sector institutions. Deployed thousands of panels at [Lakeside North Harbour in Portsmouth](https://www.portsmouth.co.uk/news/environment/thousands-of-solar-panels-to-be-installed-at-lakeside-north-harbour-in-portsmouth-3176952). Bought by Mitie for 12.4M in June 2022, from [the Energyst](https://theenergyst.com/mitie-buys-installer-custom-solar-for-12-4-million/)

elements.title: TESVolt
elements.description: TESVOLT's award-winning battery management system ensures that commercial and industrial storage systems pay for themselves within just a few years. In March 21, [Tesvolt launches offer all-in-one and ‘plug-and-play’](https://www.energy-storage.news/news/commercial-and-utility-battery-storage-launches-offer-all-in-one-and-plug-a) options

elements.title: Field energy formerly Virmati Energy
elements.description: Virmati Energy was founded by Amit Gudka, one of the co-founder of Bulb. Virmati Energy wants to show that batteries are a totally viable part of our energy infrastructure with a portfolio of batteries in the UK. In the news Feb 21 from [BusinessGreen](https://www.businessgreen.com/news/4027455/bulb-founder-steps-focus-battery-storage-venture) and on [Sifted in Nov 21](https://sifted.eu/articles/bulb-collapse-shareholder-losses-investors/) after Bulb's collapse. Raised [10M in Aug 2021](https://www.solarpowerportal.co.uk/news/field_unveils_160mw_storage_pipeline_following_10m_fundraise) to deploy 160MW of grid-scale storage. Raised another £46M in debt financing in [April 22](https://www.solarpowerportal.co.uk/news/fieldbags_46m_in_financing_to_build_110mw_portfolio_of_battery_storage_asse)

elements.title: Arenko
elements.description: Optimisation of technical and commercial performance of flexible assets in real time. Arenko underwent a significant transformation in July 2020, selling its only battery storage asset and transitioning into the software sector entirely. from [Current News](https://www.current-news.co.uk/blogs/a-pure-play-software-company-arenkos-rupert-newland-on-flexibility-and-the-new-battery-markets)

elements.title: Levelise
elements.description: Oxford based Levelise developed a home energy management system that links domestic battery systems to a suite of algorithmic controls

elements.title: Eel power
elements.description: Eel power have background in solar PV, large scale hydropower and in commercial energy storage co-located at renewable generation sites in the UK. Partnered in Feb 2021 with EDF to optimise 80MW of storage, from [Current News](https://www.current-news.co.uk/news/eelpower-selects-edf-to-optimise-80mw-of-battery-storage)

elements.title: StorTera
elements.description: Our key development is the SLIQ single liquid flow battery, which uses StorTera engineered graphite-sulphur battery chemistry and only a single tank of innovative catholyte liquid.

elements.title: Zenobe
elements.description: London based Zenobe lower the risk to our clients by eliminating the upfront capital cost and providing the storage as a service. We install, maintain and operate the storage assets so our clients can focus on running their businesses.

elements.title: VoltStorage
elements.description: Vanadium Redox Flow Batteries for home and optimisation of solar. Recently (July 2020) [raised eur6M](https://sifted.eu/articles/voltstorage-tesla-powerwall-alternative/) in funding

elements.title: EVO Energy
elements.description: We turn blue chip companies and SMEs’ sites into ecosystems of sustainable energy through rooftop solar panels, battery storage, solar carports and EV charging stations. check their [PPA](ttps://www.evoenergy.co.uk/services/power-purchase-agreement/) (min 200 panels / 40kwp, recommend epc certificate)

elements.title: BMZ
elements.description: The BMZ Group is a leader in the entire product life cycle of cross-industry lithium-ion battery systems.

elements.title: Potassium Ion batteries
elements.description: In recent years, K-ion batteries (KIBs) have attracted significant attention as potential alternatives to LIBs. This review comprehensively covers the studies on electrochemical materials for KIBs. Another paper shows [An Intrinsically Non‐flammable Electrolyte for High‐Performance Potassium Batteries](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/anie.201913174)

elements.title: Nemesys energy - University of Florence spin-off
elements.description: A patented technology for electrical energy management and storage devices ( Hydrogen-Oxygen battery) that combines traditional/standard electric batteries with hydrogen injection for the production of electricity

elements.title: li-ion versus flow
elements.description: Despite many energy storage technologies vying for market share – including much-hyped alternatives like flow batteries, which position themselves as the long-duration technology of choice – lithium-ion has maintained its leading position in the sector.

elements.title: Form Energy
elements.description: developing a new kind of battery that would eliminate the need for coal and gas entirely, and allow for a 100% renewable, carbon free grid.

elements.title: Graphene battery breakthrough
elements.description: The startup [Nanotech Energy](https://nanotechenergy.com/) claims to be “the world’s top supplier of graphene” and plans to release a non-flammable, environmentally friendly lithium battery that can charge “18 times faster than anything that is currently available on the market” — within the next year.

elements.title: Anesco
elements.description: Designed and built 103 solar farms in the UK totalling 600MW. Market leader in the UK battery storage market. Managing and monitoring 1GW of clean energy across 22,500 renewable assets.

elements.title: Hycube
elements.description: Hycube  based in Germany, residential and commercial

elements.title: RedT
elements.description: RedT  vanadium flow batteries for industrial & commercial use

elements.title: Northvolt
elements.description: Northvolt, Stockholm based.[Raised 2.7B in June 2021](https://news.crunchbase.com/news/briefing-6-9-21/). [Raised 600M in Sep 2020](https://www.electrive.com/2020/09/29/northvolt-raises-600-million-from-investors/) to expand its production and recycling capacity and research and development activities.

elements.title: Electrovaya
elements.description: Electrovaya  was founded in 1996 as a research and development company focused on Lithium ion technologies and manufacturing processes. In 2000, the company was listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX:EFL) and over the years has delivered projects for specialized applications in the aerospace, automotive and personal electronics segments.

elements.title: PowerTech Systems
elements.description: PowerTech Systems  is a French company focussed on Lithium-Ion storage market and associated technologies. Specialized in design and engineering high performance Lithium batteries (> 1KW) covering a large application spectrum

elements.title: Nant energy
elements.description: Nant energy  **Zinc batteries** aiming 100$/kwh has been recently featured in [NY times](https://www.nytimes.com/2018/09/26/business/energy-environment/zinc-battery-solar-power.html)

elements.title: Power Blox
elements.description: Power Blox  based in Zurich, working on projects for Africa / developing countries, CTO and Co-Founder is [Alessandro Medici](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alessandro-medici-90a91030/)

elements.title: Tesla powerwall
elements.description: Tesla powerwall

elements.title: Sonnen
elements.description: Sonnen  German company, been recently (Feb 19) bought by Shell [in the news](https://edition.cnn.com/2019/02/15/tech/shell-sonnen-home-batteries/index.html)

elements.title: Moixa
elements.description: Moixa  UK’s leading smart battery company, that offers integrated hardware and GridShare™ software, for renewable energy management. Acquired by Lunar Energy (a business created in 2020 for electrification of residential backed by Sunrun) [in August 2022](https://www.current-news.co.uk/news/moixa-acquired-by-one-of-the-largest-residential-solar-installers-in-the-us)

elements.title: Volts battery
elements.description: Volts battery , Finland based for residential

elements.title: PowerFlow
elements.description: PowerFlow

elements.title: FIAMM
elements.description: FIAMM  Italian battery company, part of the Hitachi group, historically for vehicles, now shifting towards other markets

elements.title: Box of Energy
elements.description: The company was founded in Gothenburg, Sweden, in 2014 with the concept of using 2nd life electric car batteries to create a product that covers all needs for energy storage.

elements.title: Relectrify
elements.description: Radically rethinking battery management system and inverter technology for long-life, low-cost battery storage

elements.title: PowerVault
elements.description: PowerVault  London based, batteries for residential, recycling EV batteries

elements.title: Reluce
elements.description: Reluce [li-ion capacitors](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithium-ion_capacitor) 120kW to 2.5MW

elements.title: Connected Energy
elements.description: Connected Energy , based in Newcastle, UK. Recycling EV batteries but for commercial and industrial

elements.title: Blue planet energy
elements.description: Blue planet energy  Hawaii based storage for residential

elements.title: Pivot Power
elements.description: Pivot Power  London + Oxford based big battery storage projects for EV charging and large residential / commercial developments connected directly to the transmission system.

elements.title: eCamion
elements.description: eCamion  was founded on the principle of providing green energy to support the future needs of a growing population and offering new solutions for Utilities, Automotive, Mining, Renewables and Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure.

elements.title: fluoride-ion battery
elements.description: new fluoride-ion battery tech from honda / jpl / caltech
